Azure Data Lake Store destinationprerequisitesprerequisitesAzure Data Lake Store destinationComplete the following prerequisites before you configure the Azure Data Lake Store destination:
In Active Directory, create a web application.
Retrieve information from Azure to configure the destination.
Grant execute permission to the web application.
At the time of writing, Microsoft Azure Data Lake Store is still in Beta, so the information here is subject to change.
If the steps below are no longer accurate, you might try the following article or check for updates to the Microsoft Azure Data Lake Store documentation: .
After you complete all of the prerequisite tasks, you can configure the Azure Data Lake Store destination.
